questions.question_text: How much time is required after a Sprint to prepare for the next Sprint?

choices.D: None. A new Sprint starts immediately following the end of the previous Sprint.
choices.A: The break between Sprints is time-boxed to 1 week for 30 day Sprints, and usually less for shorter sprints.
choices.C: Enough time for the Development team to finish the testing from the last Sprint.
choices.B: Enough time for the requirements for the next Sprint to be determined and documented.
choices.E: All of the above are allowed depending on the situation.
